com.brightcove.player.mediacontroller.buttons

Class PlayButtonController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.player.mediacontroller.buttons.AbstractButtonController
      • com.brightcove.player.mediacontroller.buttons.PlayButtonController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ButtonController

    public class PlayButtonController
extends AbstractButtonController
    The default Brightcove play button controller. This class is responsible for putting the video into play and pause modes in response to programattic (via SDK events) or user interactions (button clicks).

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.brightcove.player.mediacontroller.buttons.AbstractButtonController

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayButtonController

        public PlayButtonController(android.app.Activity activity,
                    BaseVideoView videoView,
                    int id,
                    android.view.View parentView,
                    android.graphics.Typeface font)
        Builds a play button controller object.
        Parameters:
        activity - The Android application context.
        videoView - the SDK video view object.
        id - The Android resource identifier for the given button.
        parentView - The view object contaning this button.
        font - The typeface to use on the button.

        Implements a getter for the managed video state.

      • getProperties

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getProperties()
        Implements a getter to obtain properties to emit given the current managed state. Both play and pause simply pass the playhead position.
        Specified by:
        getProperties in interface ButtonController
        Overrides:
        getProperties in class AbstractButtonController
        See Also:
